name: Quadball Party
description:
Quadball is the real-life sport originally inspired by the Harry Potter series. Play as a Keeper, a Chaser or a Beater, train to increase your stats and compete in tournaments with your team!

  • Design a character and train to develop their skills!
  • Learn the ropes in a guided tutorial!
  • Command your team with tactical formations!
  • Play against a (sometimes) realistic and (hopefully) challenging AI!
  • Compete in tournaments against the UK's top real-life Quadball teams!
  • Challenge your friends in local multiplayer mode!

Quadball Party was designed to be played with a controller, but the single-player mode is accessible with just a keyboard and mouse.
